abstract: George Vecsey Sports of The Times column observes that, with St Louis Cardinals World Series victory over Texas Rangers, Cardinals manager Tony La Russa has won his third title and his second with St Louis; notes, however, that his contract is about to expire, making his future with the team uncertain.
snippet: Cardinals Manager Tony La Russa won his third World Series title Friday night, his second with the St. Louis Cardinals, but his future with the team remains uncertain.
lead_paragraph: Cardinals Manager Tony La Russa won his third World Series title Friday night, his second with the St. Louis Cardinals, but his future with the team remains uncertain.

headline.main: Someone Ought to Make a Movie
headline.print_headline: Someone Ought To Make a Movie
headline.seo: After La Russa’s Latest Challenge, Someone Ought to Make a Movie
